backend/main.mo: Main actor defining data types (Seller, Product, Review, UserProfile) and CRUD operations with role-based access control (admin/user permissions) for sellers, products, reviews, and user profiles, including mixins for storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs, documenting landing page, catalog, product detail, checkout, and admin functionality with high confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing their purpose, from routing and queries to admin panels and theme configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode color tokens for background, foreground, borders, and semantic colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for landing, catalog, product detail, checkout, and admin pages, wrapped in ThemeProvider and QueryClientProvider with Layout and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: Form component for creating/editing products with fields for name, description, price, seller, images (with upload progress), trade-offs, and return reasons. Handles image uploads using ExternalBlob with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReviewForm: Form component for creating/editing product reviews with fields for product selection, user ID, rating (1-5), usage days, review content, and verified status checkbox.
frontend/src/components/admin/SellerForm: Form component for creating/editing seller profiles with fields for name, trust score, account age, order statistics, dispute records, policy violations, penalties, and history timeline.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying transparency policy links, contact information, copyright notice, and caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with NISHQ logo, navigation links (home, catalog, admin routes for admins), Internet Identity authentication button, theme toggle, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper component providing consistent page structure with Header, main content area, and Footer.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: A button component that toggles between light and dark themes using next-themes, displaying animated sun and moon icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication status with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including products, sellers, reviews, user profiles, and admin status checks, with automatic cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for backgrounds, borders, charts, and trust indicators using a neutral professional palette with soft green accents.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root React component with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and App wrapped in their respective providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin-only page for managing products with search functionality, product list display, and dialog form to add new products with seller assignment.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminReviewsPag: Admin page for managing reviews with search, filtering, and add review dialog. Includes admin access check, displays review list with verification status badges, and integrates ReviewForm component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSellersPag: Admin page for managing sellers with search functionality and add seller dialog. Features admin access control, seller list display with trust scores, and integrates SellerForm component.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Displays a grid of all products with trust indicators including fake review risk, return percentages, seller trust scores, and account age; clicking a product navigates to its detail page.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles secure checkout flow with shipping form, order summary showing price breakdown with tax and delivery, escrow payment information, and order confirmation with refund timeline.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero section, trust signal cards highlighting verified reviews and transparent seller history, and explanation of why NISHQ exists to optimize for trust over sales.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product information including images, description, pricing breakdown, trust metrics (seller score, account age, return rate, fake review risk), verified reviews, and checkout button.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and persisting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing. Includes sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence and hash cleanup functionality.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended typography, container queries, animations, and custom design tokens for the NISHQ platform.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining NISHQ as a trust-first Indian e-commerce platform with architectural notes, feature list, and image requirements. Documents MVP scope including user flows, admin panel, and review verification system.
